Disclaimer
RDF Lab is for informational and entertainment purposes only. I am not a financial or investment advisor. I am not an accountant, an insurance agent, nor an attorney. By using this site you agree to hold me harmless from any ramifications, financial or otherwise, that occur to you as a result of acting on information found on this site. Seek out a professional for financial advice.
Privacy Policy
RDF Lab doesn’t collect personal information about visitors except for standard traffic logs automatically generated by our web server and Google Analytics. If you choose to leave a comment or sign-up for our email list, I will then have your email address. However, I won’t sell or voluntarily disclose your email address or personal information to anyone else; that wouldn't be cricket.
